content.raw: I made the change in dd3c60f. For some reason the DART joint had an [extra transform](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/1054201b80f7768d4f163a73df137a7ecc9e2e3e/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTSliderJoint.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#DARTSliderJoint.cc-116) that effectively reversed the model frame (i.e. if axisParentModelFrame was true it used the joint frame and if axixParentModelFrame was false it used the model frame). So, I fixed that as well.
content.html: I made the change in dd3c60f. For some reason the DART joint had an extra transform that effectively reversed the model frame (i.e. if axisParentModelFrame was true it used the joint frame and if axixParentModelFrame was false it used the model frame). So, I fixed that as well.
